title: Carly's Natural Energy Shots
author: LISA NORDEN
description: Carly's Energy Shot is a shot full of energy with natural caffeine, green tea, guarana, ginseng and vitamins. 100% feature - No nonsense. 100% vegan.
cleaned_text: EVERY OCCASION FIND US IN A STORE NEAR YOU - Mother nature's finest ingredients Carly's Energy Shot was designed to be great on your tastebuds and your body. Our delicious, 100% plant-based formula provides you with a powerful combination of three sources of caffeine, vitamins with cognitive benefits, prebiotic fiber and antioxidants. [DISCOVER THE FLAVORS](/collections/all) - Clean energy with amazing taste and no crash Carly's is a 60ml Energy Shot filled with clean, no-nonsense ingredients so that you can care for your mind and body. Our energy shots include Vitamin B3, B6 and B12 and was invented to enhance your cognitive abilities while keeping you sharp and healthy for the long run! [EXPLORE THE DIFFERENCE](/pages/whats-a-functional-shot-you-ask) Carly's gives me that extra sharpness and focus for those hard workouts that demand a high level of mental and physical performance.
